behavior.name: Sinusoide Joint Control Test
behavior.author: Philipp and Spyros
behavior.description: Create sinusoide motions for all joints.

param.name: topics_to_record
param.label: Topics to Record
param.hint: Should list all important topics regarding the joint controllers.

param.name: real_robot
param.label: On real robot
param.hint: For deciding between the real robot and simulation configurations.
